Html: I want to hide the back button on the log in page. So is this possible to hide the back button.
It's possible, but (for now) requires you to create a custom ModernWindow template.

Is there any change you would be able to provide an example of how you would do this?

I did find this post:
https://mui.codeplex.com/discussions/434835

Would be great if you could provide more info as I'm getting and error in my project The type reference cannot find a public type named 'ModernWindow', using a copy and paste as you have described.

Cheers,
Shawn
I just checked in a custom EmptyWindow style for ModernWindow instances that renders content only. You may want to use it as reference for your custom window templates. See the source code.
Great! I'll take a look thanks!
